{"id":976282199,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1687345675,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"13 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/976282199/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string s, string t) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        int m = t.size();\n\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(n + 1, vector<int>(m + 1, 0));\n\n        for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {\n            dp[i][0] = i;\n        }\n\n        for (int i = 0; i <= m; i++) {\n            dp[0][i] = i;\n        }\n\n        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {\n            for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {\n                if (s[i - 1] == t[j - 1]) {\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1];\n                } else {\n                    dp[i][j] = min(dp[i - 1][j - 1], min(dp[i][j - 1], dp[i - 1][j])) + 1;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return dp[n][m];\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
